original_text:
With hooks they put him in a cage
    and brought him to the king of Babylon;
    they brought him into custody,
that his voice should no more be heard
    on the mountains of Israel.
korean_text: 우리에 넣고 갈고리를 꿰어 끌고 바벨론 왕에게 이르렀나니 그를 옥에 가두어 그 소리가 다시 이스라엘 산에 들리지 아니하게 하려 함이라

sentences.original_text: With hooks they put him in a cage
and brought him to the king of Babylon
that his voice should no more be heard
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 목소리가 더 이상 들리지 않도록
